components-in: V, S, M (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)
S0D-in: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life,  you gain 1d4  + 4 temporary hit points for the duration.
entriesHigherLevel-in: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher,  you gain 5 additional temporary hit points for each slot level above 1st.
